item.description:
The North Street Grille (http://www.northstreetgrille.com/ordereze/home.aspx) is a hidden gem in Boston's North End. Chef/Owner Robin Sidell is a great cook and puts her own spin on standard fare such as mac and cheese, burgers and sliders. Prices are very down-to-earth and portions are large. See menu-

(http://www.northstreetgrille.com/ordereze/Menu/16/Menus.aspx) On Saturdays and Sundays they serve the North End's best brunch. But we'll go for dinner on Wednesday evening, April 24th at 7:00. Meet us at the bar from 6:00-7:00 for drinks and mingling.

The restaurant is located on North Street, which runs parallel to North Square. (Paul Revere House) If you're in North Square, walk down Sun Court Street, next to the Sacred Heart Church. Please bring cash, as we won't get separate checks. It should be a fun night, with an emphasis on comfort food.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'Pages' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the bar from 6:00-7:00
item.name: North Street Grille-Dinner
